mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mybloguser(id, username, password, email, role, createdate) VALUES (myblog_seq.NEXTVAL, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, 'USER', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mybloguser ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM mybloguser ORDER BY id DESC ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN START_ROW(#{currentPage}, #{cnt_per_page}) AND END_ROW(#{currentPage}, #{cnt_per_page})
